title: Chapter 2
concept: A transformed server room where reality blends with digital space - walls becoming translucent and crystalline, with multiple floating vintage computer terminals arranged in a spiral pattern. At the center, a human silhouette stands suspended in mid-transformation, their form partially dissolved into streams of glowing code while still maintaining a recognizable human shape. The scene is viewed through a reinforced observation window, with concerned observers visible only as dark silhouettes in the foreground.
